Detailed Description

SPARK exponentiation object.

Abstract: The mathematical function of raising to a power.

Notes: Floating point is used for all arguments.

Acceptable input set: a = 10.0, b = 2.0

Interface variables
  • PORT a "Quantity being raised to a power" ;
  • PORT b "Exponent" ;
  • PORT c "a^b" ;
Functions
 c = pow__c( a, b )


 a = pow__a( c, b )
